uvb-fixture-forest.name: UVB Linear Fixture (5.0 Forest)

minimum.searchQuery: T5 HO reptisun 5.0 uvb linear fixture

recommended.searchQuery: Arcadia Forest 6% T5 HO uvb fixture

uvb-fixture-forest.notes: Essential for vitamin D3 synthesis. 5.0/6% for tropical forest species.

uvb-fixture-desert.name: UVB Linear Fixture (10.0 Desert)

minimum.searchQuery: T5 HO reptisun 10.0 uvb linear fixture

recommended.searchQuery: Arcadia Desert 12% T5 HO uvb fixture

ideal.description: Arcadia ProT5 Desert Kit with reflector
ideal.searchQuery: Arcadia ProT5 Desert uvb kit reflector

uvb-fixture-desert.notes: Essential for calcium metabolism. 10.0/12% for desert species. Requires proper distance - use Solarmeter to verify UVI 4.0-6.0 at basking spot.

plant-light.name: Plant Growth Light
plant-light.notes: Nice to have for visibility but only required for live plant setups. Use separate from UVB.
